function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Failure to screen calls for possible exposures and circumstances before worker entry","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sick leave policies may not be flexible and consistent with public health guidance, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases in the construction industry.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of communication with firms that provide contract or temporary workers about the importance of sick employees staying home, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider the concerns of workers related to pay, leave, safety, and health, leading to lower compliance with health and safety guidelines and increased risk of contagion.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information provided to workers and customers about medical care in the event of a covid-19 outbreak, leading to potential confusion and lack of preparedness.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tasks with high exposure risk to covid-19 may not be properly identified and managed, leading to potential exposure and spread of the disease among construction workers.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High exposure risks in construction activities","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of plans to deal with covid-19 in construction jobsites","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growth of construction sector in boston","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of covid-19 prevention measures on construction sites","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forceful stop-work orders impacting construction projects","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited coordination of site deliveries leading to higher contact and potential transmission","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of covid-19 transmission in construction sites due to close proximity of workers and shared workspaces.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of worker protections such as sick leave and paid time off","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic difficulties caused by covid-19","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"New generation generation c emerging due to the pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of construction workers from the formal economy from sick leave benefits, leading to vulnerability during disease outbreaks","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on demand for project types","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in demand for healthcare facilities due to pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased demand for construction projects due to unemployment and low growth","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anticipation of future business impact, structural and financial.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of isolation and loneliness due to remote work and telecommuting practices","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in shipping containers from china","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased demand for distribution and warehouse space","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of changes in law on construction projects due to pandemic-related regulations","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Liquidity crises for construction firms with high debt and low cash revenues","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of coronavirus-related delays on tax incentives for projects","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on current covid-19 pandemic for research topics","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of organizational resilience in construction businesses","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to adapt to ongoing environmental disruptions","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines for handling unprecedented events in the construction industry","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to increased collaboration and reliance on diversified suppliers and manufacturers.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Labor shortage and increase in unemployment levels leading to overcrowded workplaces and job sites.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expansion of the study to different countries and sectors may lead to the global spread of covid-19 variants","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on smartwatch data for covid-19 detection may lead to overmedicalization and unnecessary interventions.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Sample bias due to limited access to wearable devices by older people and low-income populations","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International collaboration leading to cross-border disease transmission","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on indoor health factors","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Residential cooking as a substantial source of indoor air pollutants leading to respiratory problems","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited implementation of occupant health concepts in building design and construction","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of integration of human health knowledge into building design and operation","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor air quality leading to the spread of airborne viruses and diseases","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on healthy building principles in design and construction","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the impact of buildings on occupant health","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low adoption of health objectives by building practitioners","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited understanding and awareness of health in buildings among building professionals","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through indoor environments","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and indoor air quality can lead to the spread of contagious diseases within the building environment.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close spatial organization and lack of physical distancing measures can contribute to the transmission of contagious diseases among occupants.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature control and fluctuations can weaken the immune systems of building occupants, increasing their susceptibility to contagious diseases.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"}]}
